job.title: Software Engineer (Remote)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtDescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for an experienced software engineer to join a young development teamampnbspAs a software engineer you will be building product features for a web application while optimizing user experiences security and scalabilityampnbspYou will be working closely with the product manager and UIUX designer to create userfriendly intuitive and practical interfaces actively defining how the application should work as well as how it looks ampnbspYou will be involved in all aspects of the product development lifecycle from planning to deployment ensuring that a quality product is delivered and provides value to its end usersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDesign develop and maintain the structure and design of the web and mobile pages within the application optimizing for speed scalability and responsivenessltligtltligtWork closely with product managers UIUX designers and other developers to ensure new product features meet business objectives as well as technical standardsltligtltligtAssist with designing building and maintaining core backend services and APIs for the Q4J appltligtltligtDesign and maintain reusable code and library for future use to ensure consistency across the suiteltligtltligtSupport the test and deployment of new products and featuresltligtltligtParticipate in code reviewsltligtltligtContinuously stay up to date on latest emerging technologyltligtltulgtltligtltbrgtltligtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt35 years of proven work experience as a software developer both developing and testing webbased applicationsltligtltligtWorking experience with React or other similar frontend frameworks Javascript and CSSltligtltligtExperience with building hybrid web and mobile applications ensuring responsive and adaptive designsltligtltligtExperience in objectoriented design and database designltligtltligtExperience working in crossfunctional teams with other developers UIUX designers and QAsltligtltligtYou must be introspectiveltligtltligtYou must be motivated by values particularly those related to right and wrong such as justiceltligtltulgt
